answerText: entropy[10] Von Neumann entropy is defined as negative the trace of this operator times the natural log of this operator. This operator is used to describe states in a mixture of pure state kets.

question: Question:  [10] Name this quantity which is, for black holes, is proportional to the area of the event horizon. The fluctuation theorem governs its probability of increasing or decreasing at non-equilibrium.
